app.name: Strongpoint for NetSuite
app.short_description: Customers  push Zendesk tickets into a NetSuite Strongpoint Change Request, enabling easy management of changes
app.long_description: Strongpoint integration with Zendesk help customers to push Zendesk tickets into a NetSuite Strongpoint Change Request, enabling easy management of changes, seamless tracking of compliant changes and automate the reconciliation of change logs during audit.
app.installation_instructions: After install, you should add the NetSuite credentials and we suggest visiting our Help page for more information.
